Rubenstein Public Relations Named Agency Of Record For New York City

thread.title: Rubenstein Public Relations Named Agency Of Record For New York City's 42nd Annual Village Halloween Parade
thread.title_full: Rubenstein Public Relations Named Agency Of Record For New York City's 42nd Annual Village Halloween Parade

title: Rubenstein Public Relations Named Agency Of Record For New York City's 42nd Annual Village Halloween Parade
text:
Rubenstein Public Relations Named Agency Of Record For New York City's 42nd Annual Village Halloween Parade By PR Newswire | 07/15/15 - 02:59 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK , July 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Richard Rubenstein , President of Rubenstein Public Relations (RPR), announced today that the firm has been named the agency of record for New York City's 42nd Annual Village Halloween Parade . For the third consecutive year, RPR will provide pro bono public relations services to support the city's most iconic Halloween tradition. The parade will begin on Sixth Avenue and Spring Street and travel along Sixth Avenue to 16th Street on Saturday, October 31 st from 7PM-10:30PM and will air on Time Warner Cable's NY1 from 8PM to 9:30PM . "Each year, the Village Halloween parade evokes a city-wide sense of camaraderie, pride and excitement," stated Rubenstein. "We are proud to once again be a part of a traditional New York City event that has made such a positive cultural impact by bringing New Yorkers together in celebration."The parade will feature more than 50 musical bands, in addition to hundreds of puppets, dancers, artists and thousands of proud New Yorkers marching in creative costumes. The RPR team will design a custom float for the company's employees, friends and family to participate in the parade as well. The legendary event has entertained the public on Halloween night for the past 41 years, attracting millions of people from around the world. For more information, please visit http://www.halloween-nyc.com . About Rubenstein Public Relations Rubenstein Public Relations (RPR) is a leading full-service agency based in New York that produces high-profile communications campaigns through branding and messaging, media relations, creative and business development services. Our comprehensive strategy, savvy media expertise and proactive approach shapes and markets a brand's core attributes to generate meaningful results for clients. We represent some of the world's most prominent names in the real estate, business, luxury lifestyle, entertainment, technology, healthcare and non-profit sectors. ( www.rubensteinpr.com ) To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/rubenstein-public-relations-named-agency-of-record-for-new-york-citys-42nd-annual-village-halloween-parade-300113936.html SOURCE Rubenstein Public Relations Copyright 2011 PR Newswire.
